backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining product, category, user, and purchase types with storage, authorization, and Stripe integration, plus CRUD operations for products and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features related to generating a custom product image and updating demo data to reference it.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH tokens and global style application.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file setting metadata, favicon links, root mount point, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router, layout, theme provider, modals, and user profile detection.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductDig: Dialog for uploading, updating, or removing a product’s digital download file with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DemoDataSeeder.t: Admin-only utility component that seeds categories, demo products with images and INR pricing, hero banner, and brand story content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, categories, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, authentication handling, and admin/user-specific links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter and save their name for profile setup.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries when Stripe is not yet set up.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and helpers using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, homepage content, products, and related entities via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and custom utility classes for premium UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying the brand story, values, and imagery for Digi Store.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard allowing authenticated admins to manage hero banners, brand stories, products, categories, and digital downloads.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with company contact details and a form that simulates message submission with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadsPage.tsx: Displays a user's digital downloads, handling login state, loading states, and rendering purchased downloadable products.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, featured products, and loading placeholders based on fetched CMS data.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with common issues and navigation options back to the shop or support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes successful payments, records digital purchases, and shows available downloads once processing is complete.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with purchase flow, loading state, and fallback for missing products.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Provides product browsing with search, category filters, loading states, and a grid of product cards.
frontend/src/utils/productImage.ts: Utility to safely extract a product image URL from an ExternalBlob array with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings to support the app’s design theme.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, requirements, and feature list related to building a kids‑worksheets digital product app.
